phrases: I said, do whatever you like!
It is not like I like Koizumi or anything.
The truth is, I know how to perform magic.
I can use my magic to bring you happiness, Koizumi-san.
Just so you know, I am the one Koizumi-san likes.
There is no way she would fall for someone like you.
I am going to stop liking Otani.
This time, we really can go back to the way we were.
I am not going to lose to you again.
Challenge me any time you want.
Were not you meant to be cheering for Maity?
Well, Maity-sama is wonderful, of course,
So what is going on with you and Otani anyway?
The comedy duo has been revived!
How exactly did you guys end up like that again?
This is the most comfortable way for us to be anyway.
Risa, are you aware of your situation right now?
The Maity club is... is disbanded now, right?
It is so awful that Maity-sensei has a fiancee!
I was not trying to hide it or anything...
Everyone is really down about it.
It has not got you down, has it, Koizumi-san?
Risa says she and Otani-kun are back to being a comedy duo again.
Despite what people might think, you are actually quite timid, are not you, Koizumi-san?
Well, in any case, I am glad that Otani-kun is better now.
My magic spell has not broken yet, Koizumi-san
His ankle has healed, so he is in top form.
And since his final basketball competition is coming up, he is trying even harder.
Just so you know, I am the one Koizumi-san likes.
There is no way she would fall for someone like you.
I am not going to hold on to any inappropriate hope.
It is going to go back to the way it was.
Back to the way it was.
You did not have to hit me!
Oh, I am ever so sorry.
My legs are just sooo long...
I am going to get you!
I am going to get you!
Risa, are you really fine with things going back to the way they were before?
So the basketball competition is going to be this weekend?
I will bring that with me.
You know... the kind of cute things that a manager would bring.
What on earth would that taste like?
But I want to cheer you on...
If I eat anything weird like that, I will be sick.
Then I will make it for Maity-sensei.
The coach will be back tomorrow.
We will not need that guy any more.
Could it be he really is jealous?
What are you doing, shaking your head like that?
Please dip the lemons in honey, okay?
Do not mess it up, okay?
Back to the way it was, back to the way it was...
Just hurry up and get together!
If only Otani would make a move now...
In the end I guess it is Otani-kun who holds the key to all this.
Darling, why do not you give him a push?
Let us just leave the youngsters to their own devices.
If we leave these two alone,
Push him down and claim him as your own!
If you do not, I will!
It annoys me just watching you two!
If you are going to get together, hurry up and do it!
It is easier said than done!
I have decided I am not going to hold on to any hope.
But you have not given up, have you?
Do not tell me you are just going to wait like that until Otani confesses?
Waiting for that guy to take the initiative is like going fishing in a swimming pool.
But there might be koi swimming in there.
What kind of pool are you thinking of?
You seem to be in a good mood.
We will find out the tournament draw tomorrow.
It is our last big competition.
I am really looking forward to it.
Hey, hey, come shopping with me after school.
What happens if we fluke it to the finals?
When I go for it, I really go for it.
I cannot be held responsible if you fall for me again.
It was a joke, a joke.
Still, at the end of the day, I just cannot give up.
Is it... is it so bad if I hold on to just a little bit of hope?
They are a little too energetic, huh?
My darling is just a bench warmer...
You are still going to cheer for them, right?
You are going to come and watch us?
Let Me see, let me see.
Hey, hey, since we are all going, let us invite Chiharu-chan...
Oh, our first opponents are last year's champions.
I thought you were going for the finals.
He is turned into a robot.
Despite what people may think, you are actually quite timid, are not you, Koizumi-san?
As Maity said, I am just afraid to find out what Otani is really thinking.
Please dip the lemons in honey, okay?
If I just go back to pretending things are the way they were before,
It does not matter what Otani thinks of me.
The match is about to start.
Do not scare me so early in the morning!
I was up all night making our cheering gear.
Starting today, you are all part of the Otani Club!
I will cheer for you from the bench, okay?
Hey man, we are your first opponents.
We met our opponents just now, and it left him quite shocked.
He wandered off somewhere in a daze.
Is not the first match about to start?
I will go look for him.
I got dragged into the Otani Club.
I am just a bench warmer, after all.
I guess you could say I am trying to focus my mind.
The match is about to start.
What is with this Otani Club?
After I came specifically to cheer you on and all!
You do not need to cheer.
I mean, we are going to lose anyway.
It is more embarrassing if you are cheering away loudly while we are losing.
If you keep saying you will lose,
Well, what can I do against those guys?
So that is how it is.
I do not want to cheer for a guy like you, anyway.
I am going to call you a loser midget for the rest of your life!
I stayed up all night, so I am tired.
After making a girl with a boyfriend act so disloyally...
I do not want to watch a pointless match.
What is this about going home?
Why did not you go home after you have cheered me on properly?
I am not cheering for someone with no spirit.
I am fired up and ready to go.
It is been a while since I have received it, has not it?
You will fall for me again.
Say what you want, say what you want.
That is no normal height range...
When Otani goes for it, he really goes for it.
He got past that tall guy!
What exactly did you put on these lemons?
I did not have any honey, so...
Good thing I did not eat these before the match.
And after I stayed up all night, rubbing sleepy eyes in order to make them.
Well, you came to cheer me on and all, but we still lost.
Yeah, but you were still really cool.
You made me fall for you again.
Well, I played so well thanks to you.
I know you said you have given up on me, but...
I guess I am just... no good without you, Koizumi.
Koizumi, what do you want for your birthday?
I do not need a cute ring or anything like that.
All I want is your love, Otani!
Next: The Best Birthday in History.
